author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Hyrde ic secgan gen      bi sumum fugle
text.3: þæt word þe gecwæð      wuldres ealdor:
text.4: "In swa hwylce tiid      swa ge mid treowe to me
text.5: on hyge hweorfað,      ond ge hellfirena
text.6: sweartra geswicað,      swa ic symle to eow
text.8: þurh milde mod.      Ge beoð me siþþan
text.11: Uton we þy geornor      gode oliccan,
text.13: duguðe to dryhtne,      þenden us dæg scine,
